IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: Giving to a broad range of human service and other organizations serving Concord and Carlisle.
IRS990.MissionDescription: To meet the evolving needs of our communities and our donors by raising funds and giving responsibly to a broad range of human service and other organizations that strengthen Concord and Carlisle.
IRS990.Description: The Community Chest assisted and supported thirty-six local member welfare, charitable, educational and character-building agencies through the collection, allocation and distribution of funds or property.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The entire Board is provided with a copy of Form 990, and it is reviewed by the President, Treasurer, Executive Director and Bookkeeper prior to filing.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Verbal confirmation is solicited from Board members prior to each vote.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Board of Directors sets the compensation for the executive director and all employees after reviewing data on compensation at similar organizations in the area. The actions of the board are recorded in the minutes.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 18
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Any documents will be provided upon request.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Any documents will be provided upon request.
